Nama Mata Kuliah:
Perlakuan Permukaan dan Teknologi
Pelapisan (Surface Treatments and
Coating Technology)

No:
Deskripsi Mata Kuliah (Course Description):
Mata kuliah Perlakuan Permukaan memberikan penjelasan terkait perananan
penting aplikasi perlakuan permukaan, karakterisasi, pemilihan teknik, dan interaksi
antara perlakuan permukaan dengan lingkungan sekitarnya.
Tujuan Pembelajaran (Course Objective):
Memahami berbagai macam perlakuan pada bahan yaitu perlakuan panas, perlakuan
mekanis, perlakuan termokimia, serta memahami plating
Capaian Pembelajaran Lulusan (CPL) atau Student Outcomes (SO): A1, A3, dan B3
Materi Pembelajaran (Outline Syllabus):
Perlakuan panas (heat treatment), perlakuan mekanis (mechanical treatment),
perlakuan termokimia (thermo-chemical treatment): carburising, nitriding,
carbonitriding, chormising, boronising, aluminizing, implantasi ion. PVD (Physical
Vapour Deposition), CVD (Chemical Vapour Deposition), Plating Processes:
Electroplating, Electroforming, Electroless plating, Hot dipping. Laser treatment.
Metode Pembelajaran SCL yang dipilih (Methods of Delivery):
Case-based learning, Project-based learning
Metode Penilaian (Assessment Methods):
Tugas, Quiz, Project, UTS, UAS, Project.
Referensi (Reference):
1) Mattox, D. M. (2014). Handbook of Physical Vapor Deposition (PVD)
Processing. Netherlands: Elsevier Science.
2) Jacobson, D., Poate, J., Foti, G. (2013). Surface Modification and Alloying:
By Laser, Ion, and Electron Beams. Germany: Springer US.
3) Laser Surface Treatment of Metals. (2012). Netherlands: Springer
Netherlands.
4) Gabe, D. R. (2014). Principles of Metal Surface Treatment and Protection:
Pergamon International Library of Science, Technology, Engineering and
Social Studies: International Series on Materials Science and Technology.
United Kingdom: Elsevier Science.
5) Niku-Lari, A. (2013). Advances in Surface Treatments: Technology —
Applications — Effects. United Kingdom: Elsevier Science.
